body.description: p>Why choose our watch remote control car？ Because our watch car is very portable. Just wear it on your hand. You can play whenever and wherever you want when you go out. The watch is the controller, which is very novel for children. How to use this watch remote control car toy？ 1. Insert the battery into the watch. 2. Charge the car before use. 3. Make sure the roller switch is in the OFF position, and after the indicator light goes out, turn the roller switch to the ON position. 4. Press the button of the watch, you can choose forward and backward to control the driving of the car. Package Includes: 1 *Car 1 * USB Cable 1 * Watch 1 * Screwdriver 1*Manual 1 * Gift Box
